subject: Shifter and handbrake
description_text: Hello, If i would buy the new controller box for the pedals, where do I connect the shifter and handbrake? Best Regards Dennis Hamzic -- Gesendet mit der WEB.DE Mail App

conversations.body_text: Hi Dennis Hamzic,      Could you please provide photos of the shifter and handbrake? I’ll help you check and confirm the issue.

I didn't bought it yet. I am just curious. Because the controller box for the pro plus pedals can take shifter and handbrake. Best regards Dennis -- Gesendet mit der WEB.DE Mail App Am 04.06.25, 14:20 schrieb "service@simsonn.com"

Hi Dennis Hamzic,  Both the sequential shifter and the paddle shifter have their own control boards and can be connected directly to the computer via USB. Therefore, placing them on the pedals is redundant. To accommodate the vibration motor, we had to remove these interfaces.
